dublinCore.dc:title: 113 HR 5555 IH: FIREARM Act
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mrs. Black (for herself and Mr. Poe of Texas) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on the Judiciary

form.official-title: To prohibit the Federal Government from requiring race or ethnicity to be disclosed in connection with the transfer of a firearm.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the FIREARM Act.

section.header: Prohibition on the Federal Government to require race or ethnicity to be disclosed in connection with the transfer of a firearm
section.text: The Federal Government may not require any person to disclose the race or ethnicity of the person in connection with the transfer of a firearm to the person.
